description: Fourteen alleged accomplices to the deadly 2015 attack on the French magazine go on trial on Wednesday.
title: Charlie Hebdo: Magazine republishes controversial Mohammed cartoons
title_page: Charlie Hebdo: Magazine republishes controversial Mohammed cartoons - BBC News
maintext: "We have always refused to do so, not because it is prohibited - the law allows us to do so - but because there was a need for a good reason to do it, a reason which has meaning and which brings something to the debate," it says.
